structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Application for license of inactive status -- Reactivation.

text.section: A person licensed under KRS 311.674 and 311.675 may apply for inactive status upon submitting an application and paying an inactive-status fee.

An inactive license may be reactivated upon application to the board. If a license has been inactive for more than five (5) consecutive years, the licensed practitioner shall apply for a new license and shall meet all the requirements in existence for a license under KRS 311.674 and 311.675. That application for licensure shall require:
Evidence of the license holder's payment of an inactive-status fee; and
Payment of the initial licensure fee.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 11, effective July 15, 2014. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 249, sec. 13, effective July 12, 2006.
